alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:31AM CST until February 19 at 3:09PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Hancock, Grainger and Claiborne Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Clinch River above Tazewell TN. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Action stage. At 12.0 feet, Flooding of pasture land near Grissom Island begins. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by flooding of the Clinch River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM EST Sunday was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 3.7 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 415 PM EST.
